name: billiards-bug
description: Billiards score overlay application for streaming

scripts.compile-frontend: tsc src/public/*.ts --outDir dist/public --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node
scripts.dev: npm run compile-frontend && npm run copy-frontend && NODE_OPTIONS= ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.sea-build: npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run sea-generate && npm run sea-create
scripts.sea-build-windows: npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run sea-generate && npm run sea-create-windows
scripts.sea-build-all: npm run sea-build && npm run sea-create-windows
scripts.sea-create: cp $(command -v node) dist/billiards-bug && npx postject dist/billiards-bug NODE_SEA_BLOB dist/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.sea-create-windows: cp dist/windows/node-v22.16.0-win-x64/node.exe dist/billiards-bug.exe && npx postject dist/billiards-bug.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB dist/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
